translations.oringalInput: And behold, I shall be a blight upon the land, and everything I touch shall wither and die.

translations.translation: І вось, я буду забіваць зямлю, і ўсё, што я дакрануся, засыхае і памрэ.
Et voici, je tuerai la terre, et tout ce que je toucherai se dessèchera et mourra.
Agus, féuch, maróidh mé an talamh, agus imeoidh gach rud a rachaidh mé i dteagmháil leis agus gheobhaidh sé bás.
そして、見よ、私は地球を殺し、私が触れるすべてのものは滅び、そして死ぬ。
И вот, Я убью землю, все, чего я коснусь, погибнет и умрет.
Và bây giờ, tôi sẽ giết trái đất, tất cả những gì tôi chạm vào sẽ hư mất và chết.

engReTranslations: And behold, I will kill the earth, and everything I touch will dry up and die.
And, behold, I will kill the earth, and everything that I touch shall wither away and die.
And, behold, I will slay the earth, and all that I touch shall perish, and shall die.
And behold, I will kill the earth, everything I touch will perish, and die.
And now, I will kill the earth, everything that I touch will perish and die.
And now, I will kill the earth, everything I touch will perish and die.
